resources.string: There are no galleries here.\nUse the button below to select a contact and create a new gallery.
Are you sure you want to delete this gallery? All files in the gallery will be lost forever.
Are you sure you want to delete this file?
This gallery is empty. Click on the + button and add photos, videos and voice reordings.

It looks like the app is still missing some permissions. In order to work correctly the app needs the permission to read your contacts, write on memory and record audio from the microphone.\n\nPlease go to the app\'s settings and grant all the requested permissions and restart the app.
